name: Cat Companion
description:
A virtual pet cat that roams your desktop and drifts off on the tops of your windows. It keeps the atmosphere cozy and adds life to your screen!

Download to bring a cute cat to your desktop!

 🐾 Prowls across your screen

 🐾 Jumps onto your windows

 🐾 Sleeps peacefully while you play, work or study

 🐾 Can be thrown (please do not throw)

 🐾 Works for multiple screens !!

Controls:

 🐾 Press and hold ESCAPE to exit

 🐾 Press F3 to see a debug view of your screens

 🐾 Click and drag on the cat to throw it

Links:

 🐾 Discord: https://discord.gg/RgJ5EV2Ehz (Updates will be first shown here !!)

 🐾 Twitter: https://twitter.com/seasaltcwackers

 🐾 Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCo9uoDJoNyHv12qgaVQ7GRg

Download Instructions:

Please unzip the file and run CatCompanion.exe inside the executable folder.

When opened you may be prompted with a pop up from Microsoft Defender. To continue press More Info then Run anyway.

Note: This application is far from done and I plan on keeping it updated with bug fixes, optimisation and new features!
